mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.server_class_name, IF(server_type=1,'参考价','需咨询') server_type_str FROM shop_server a, server_class b WHERE a.server_class_id = b.server_class_id

SELECT c.member_no, d.nickname, d.phone, CONCAT(d.nickname, "--", d.phone) server_name_phone FROM order_info a, shop_server b, server_member_info c, member_info d WHERE a.shop_server_id = b.shop_server_id AND LOCATE( b.server_class_id, c.server_class_id_str ) > 0 AND c.member_no = d.member_no AND c.order_takes_type IN (1, 2) AND a.order_id= #{order_id}

SELECT b.*, c.nickname, c.photo, c.phone, IFNULL(d.order_count,0) order_count FROM shop_server a, server_member_info b, member_info c LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(order_id) order_count, server_member_no FROM order_info WHERE order_status IN (1,3,7) GROUP BY server_member_no ) d ON c.member_no = d.server_member_no WHERE b.member_no = c.member_no AND LOCATE( a.server_class_id, b.server_class_id_str ) > 0 AND b.order_takes_type != 0 AND b.in_prohi = 0 AND a.shop_server_id = '${shop_server_id}' ORDER BY d.order_count

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROUND( 6378.138 * 2 * ASIN( SQRT( POW( SIN( ( '${address_y}' * PI() / 180 - b.lat * PI() / 180 ) / 2 ), 2 ) + COS('${address_y}' * PI() / 180) * COS(b.lat * PI() / 180) * POW( SIN( ( '${address_x}' * PI() / 180 - b.lon * PI() / 180 ) / 2 ), 2 ) ) ) * 1000 ) AS juli, b.*, c.nickname, c.photo, c.phone, IFNULL(d.order_count,0) order_count FROM shop_server a, server_member_info b, member_info c LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(order_id) order_count, server_member_no FROM order_info WHERE order_status IN (1,3,7) GROUP BY server_member_no ) d ON c.member_no = d.server_member_no WHERE b.member_no = c.member_no AND LOCATE( a.server_class_id, b.server_class_id_str ) > 0 AND b.order_takes_type != 0 AND b.in_prohi = 0 AND a.shop_server_id = '${shop_server_id}' ) a WHERE 5000 >a.juli ORDER BY a.order_count
SELECT * FROM member_prohi WHERE prohi_status = 0 AND DATE_ADD( create_time, INTERVAL prohi_time HOUR ) > NOW()

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(b.appointment_time_start, '%d') appointment_time_start, DATE_FORMAT(b.appointment_time_end, '%d') appointment_time_end, DATE_FORMAT( b.appointment_time_start, '%Y-%m-%d' ) the_day, DATE_FORMAT( b.appointment_time_start, '%m月%d日' ) the_day_str FROM member_info a, order_info b WHERE a.member_no = b.server_member_no AND a.member_no = '${member_no}' AND b.order_status IN (1, 8)
SELECT a.age, a.member_type, a.nickname, a.phone, a.photo, b.* FROM member_info a, server_member_info b WHERE a.member_no = b.member_no AND a.member_type = 2
SELECT a.age, a.member_type, a.nickname, a.phone, a.photo, b.* FROM member_info a, server_member_info b WHERE a.member_no = b.member_no AND a.member_no= #{member_no}
